MS MCQs

    Dynamics 365 Guides for administrators

    »

    1. What does the administrator need to do before installing Dynamics 365 Guides on PC and HoloLens?

      Set up Power BI reports.

      Install the Dynamics 365 Guides solution.

      Create new users and assign them roles.


    2. Before upgrading the Dynamics 365 Guides solution, which one of the following do you need to do?

      Keep the PC and HoloLens app open.

      Block the update to the PC and HoloLens apps.

      Make sure you have the System administrator security role and a Dynamics 365 Guides license assigned.


    3. Which one of the following statements is true about deactivating and deleting a guide?

      There is no difference between deactivating and deleting a guide.

      Deactivating enables you to keep the record in the system.

      A deleted record can be retrieved.


    4. Can you opt out of storing Dynamics 365 Guides usage data?

      Yes.

      No.


    5. Which of the following Dynamics 365 apps cannot be integrated with Dynamics 365 Guides?

      Dynamics 365 Field Service

      Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management

      Dynamics 365 Sales
